dataSource.description: AI needs access to your Google Ads account to generate the audit.

audit.title: Performance Audit
audit.description: Your account has been analyzed. Here are the optimization opportunities detected to improve your ROAS.

lowQualityScore.title: Low quality scores
lowQualityScore.description: 3 campaigns have a quality score below 5/10.

budgetLimited.description: The "Search - Paris" campaign is limited by budget.

duplicateKeywords.title: Duplicate keywords
duplicateKeywords.description: Similar keywords detected in different ad groups.
